00020 template <class T>
00021 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const Fortran_Array3D<T> &A)
00022 {
00023     int M=A.dim1();
00024     int N=A.dim2();
00025     int K=A.dim3();
00026 
00027     s << M << " " << N << " " << K << "\n";
00028 
00029     for (int i=1; i<=M; i++)
00030     {
00031         for (int j=1; j<=N; j++)
00032         {
00033                         for (int k=1; k<=K; k++)
00034                 s << A(i,j,k) << " ";
00035                         s << "\n";
00036         }
00037         s << "\n";
00038     }
00039 
00040 
00041     return s;
00042 }

00060 template <class T>
00061 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream &s, Fortran_Array3D<T> &A)
00062 {
00063 
00064     int M, N, K;
00065 
00066     s >> M >> N >> K;
00067 
00068         Fortran_Array3D<T> B(M,N,K);
00069 
00070     for (int i=1; i<=M; i++)
00071         for (int j=1; j<=N; j++)
00072                         for (int k=1; k<=K; k++)
00073                 s >>  B(i,j,k);
00074 
00075         A = B;
00076     return s;
00077 }
